rules_text:
Mettalia is all colors.
Mettalia has protection from each color among cards she's salvaged in exile.
When Mettalia enters, for each color, you may salvage a nonlegendary card of that color. [i](You may exile them from your graveyard until this creature leaves the battlefield. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a card it salvaged into your hand.)[/i]
